EmailTemplate.name: Serpentine Gallery Pavilion 2014 - 2nd Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the date - 3 September 2014, Serpentine Gallery Pavilion
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Save the date – Serpentine Gallery Pavilion Look out for your invitation in the post
Private View AECOM invites you to join us for an evening of drinks and canapés to celebrate the opening of this year’s Serpentine Gallery Pavilion.
Architecture by Smiljan Radić Engineering and technical design, cost management and project management by AECOM.
RSVP by Friday 22 August to:
On: Wednesday 3 September 2014 6.30-10.30pm
At: Serpentine Gallery, Kensington Gardens, London W2 3XA
RSVP
E: RSVPserpentine.europe@aecom.com T: +44 (0)20 7645 2017
